message: For discussion... what do u think of Javascript ? can it be your main language ?

data.message: It's already
soon it will everyone's main language :D
https://www.destroyallsoftware.com/talks/wat
of course, it's already my main and preferred language.
it is the future of UI Tier - web Tier - REST services Tier. Python will stay in data analysis tier . (javascript for me = Typescript)

In a nutshell, dynamic language with C like Syntax and with functional programming features. That will be Javascript, Java, C#. Throw in a framework for the frontend and one for the backend and you could say your programming in the same language anyway :)
Mahmoud Saeed
P.S. the future is to master the concepts and not be afraid to switch compilers or syntax, to code like a man! :)

I think it's one of the most long living languages for the next 25 years or may be more.
You can build any kind of applications with it.
A programmer should not be tied to a syntax, but for content n crud apps, mobile, web,desktop.. js is the one!
It's already everything
https://www.quora.com/Which-backend-programming-language-should-I-learn-in-2016

Programming Languages are just a syntax-In most cases ðŸ˜ƒ- its all about the Framework, the API you're dealing with
Like JS it was only a language for the frontend now after node its available to do a lot more
And like Swift the new iOS baby language because it is open source there is now a framework called Viper i think allows you to create backend. and its super fast

maybe your main script!

in my opinion java script very good script ing programming language
it improve performance of your web site and make UX  of your web site is very flexible and  it decrease loading in your server so it is very good for performance 
but it's bad in some cases such as security for example hacker may be use java script to attack your history and steal passwords and user names 
and cross plat form it doesn't work in all browser at the same time

You know that feeling when you despise someone and everybody else like him and you're like are you guys out of your mind? And you get pissed off even more? Yeah I'm talking about JS. Friggin hate that piece of shit.

yes it can be my main language , pros: works almost everywhere browser, server , desktop apps , mobile apps , embedded systems... , also very flexible syntax 
Cons: 90% of code is spaghetti , the async nature of it may cause you a headache, tests in non strict syntax in a nightmare

conclusion: love it or not , it is a must to know it these days
I hope webassembly takes over soon

https://www.facebook.com/groups/egyptian.geeks/permalink/1275593949146977/
It's very easy to learn but very hard to master. It's internals are not straight forward for beginners who come from Java world

IMO There is no language is a main language, it depends on what you want to do.  What you like to develop. The thing about js is u can code frontend and backend with it, but it might not be ur first backend choice for many reasons. My advice would be to know in which area you would like to develop or specialize first. At the end full stack developers cant know about backend as much as backend engineers do. Plus i dont think i have seen big companies offering full stack positions either backend or frontend or whatsoever .. all the best
I try not to think of JavaScript. :P
